question: Provide a list of quests in The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings, categorized by chapter.
answer: { "Chapter I (Vizima)": ["The Ancient Tombs", "The White Lady", "The Fencing Tournament", "A Golem Walks into the Bar...", "The Unseen Elder"], "Chapter II (Skellige Isles)": ["Mysterious Stranger", "Of Sabotage and Scoundrels", "King Keira Metz's Request", "The King of the Wolves", "The King's Sister"], "Chapter III (Lakeside, Murky Waters, Black Tern Island)": ["Ripples", "Free Elves", "Hunting the Wild Hunt", "Old Habits Die Hard", "The Paths of Destiny"], "Chapter IV (Murky Waters)": ["Alvin", "Daily Bread", "Temptation", "Small Problems", "The Ancient Cemetaur"], "Chapter V (Old Vizima)": ["Her Highness the Striga", "Hope Burns Bright", "Sweet Revenge", "The Bloedzuiger Contract", "The Bruxa Contract"]}
